name: Circlet of Faith
tooltip:
Circlet of FaithLevel 60

Father Inigo Montoy at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Circlet of Faith if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Circlet, 15 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 3 Mooncloth and 3 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Circlet
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 15
- Mooncloth x 3
- Nexus Crystal x 3
